fields.description:
With changes for EUCA-13386 in place there is still an extra /:

{code}
#
# euctl euca='System.getProperty("euca.var.dir")'
//var/lib/eucalyptus
#
{code}

This is gone when the prefix of / is removed:

{code}
#
# euctl euca='System.getProperty("euca.var.dir")'
/var/lib/eucalyptus
#
{code}

Configure command used for the above:

{code}
# ./configure --prefix= --disable-bundled-jars --with-apache2-module-dir=/usr/lib64/httpd/modules --with-axis2=/usr/share/axis2-* --with-axis2c=/usr/lib64/axis2c --with-db-home=/usr

fields.summary: Rpm configures with prefix of / causing duplicate /s

comments.body: --prefix is supposed to be /usr anyway.  How about we just start handling it correctly?

I've been using {noformat}--prefix=/{noformat} which we document in the INSTALL text file. (Actually, {noformat}--prefix=$EUCALYPTUS{noformat} but it only works if {{EUCALYPTUS=/}}

For eucalyptus-cloud-libs, it's {noformat}--prefix=/usr{noformat}
Will resolve by modifying build scripts, which is where the problem starts.
